headline: Gigapower Appoints Toni Broberg to Vice President of External Affairs
summary: DALLAS, June 18, 2025--Gigapower, a joint venture between AT&T and a fund managed by Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP), a part of Blackrock with the goal of expanding high-speed, reliable fiber internet through open-access networks, has appointed Toni Broberg to the position of Vice President of External Affairs.

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From AT&T’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: AT&T’s first quarter delivered steady growth, with positive market reaction driven by strength in mobility and consumer wireline businesses. Management credited robust postpaid phone and fiber subscriber gains as key contributors, noting that targeted investments in customer acquisition and network expansion paid off. headline: Donald Trump Wants You To Use His New $47 Mobile Plan With A $499 Gold Phone Made In America
